paper_abstract: We propose a public-key encryption scheme and key agreement protocols based on a group action on a set. We construct an implementation of these schemes for the action of the class group CL(OK) of an imaginary quadratic field K on the set ELL(p,n) (OK) of isomorphism classes of elliptic curves over F(p) with n points and the endomorphism ring O(K). This introduces a novel way of using elliptic curves for constructing asymmetric cryptography.
paper_title: CONSTRUCTING PUBLIC- KEY CRYPTOGRAPHIC SCHEMES BASED ON CLASS GROUP ACTION ON A SET OF ISOGENOUS ELLIPTIC CURVES
